summary:
ReOne - Win With Breathtaking Struggle

 Graphics - High-quality graphics will provide players with a realistic football field experience.

 Game Physics - Adhering to real game physics, artificial intelligence and character movements will make players feel like they are in the real world of football.

 Artificial intelligence - Artificial intelligence players in the game will display competitive and intelligent behaviors.

 Controls & Guards - User-friendly control mechanisms will allow players to easily control the game and make the moves they want.
